author: Zoe Strozewski
title: House Committee Asks for More Details on Boxes Found at Trump's Mar-a-Lago
description: Representative Carolyn Maloney, the committee's chairwoman, made the request in a letter to National Archivist David Ferriero.
content: The House Oversight Committee has requested more information on former President Donald Trump's handling of certain White House records, including those allegedly found in boxes at his Mar-a-Lago resâ€¦ [+3264 chars]
